short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monetize your SearchIQ links with Ad.net

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ad.netâ€™s SearchIQ technology enables publishers and content creators to effortlessly unlock monetization and generate income through unique ad placement opportunities while improving user experience. With our user-friendly Chrome extension, you can seamlessly convert content into revenue producing links, allowing you to earn commissions from clicks or sales resulting from that link. The extension displays the best possible merchant rate (CPC) to maximize your revenue. 

Leverage our Search IQ technology and our Chrome Extension Link Creator, on your website, blogs, social networks, newsletters, and communities or anywhere that a link can be shared to create incremental revenue. Ad.net offers the flexibility to earn from anywhere, right from your browser.  

Features of Search IQ: 

Site Wide Monetization 

Improved User engagement 

Easy to Use
